title: A history of pandemics: from Spanish Flu to Covid-19
itunes:title: A history of pandemics: from Spanish Flu to Covid-19
itunes:subtitle: Mark Honigsbaum compares the Covid-19 pandemic to previous diseases outbreaks over the past century. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Medical historian and journalist Mark Honigsbaum, author of The Pandemic Century, compares the current Covid-19 pandemic, and our responses to it, to previous diseases outbreaks over the past 100 years. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
